profile.title: User Profile
profile.mustLogin: You must sign in to view the settings.
profile.noPrivateKey: There is no private key on this device to export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Set a password to encrypt your backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Enter the password for this backup:
profile.importSuccess: Private key imported to this device.
profile.importFailed: Failed to import key (incorrect password or corrupt file).
profile.keysRotated: New key pair generated and public key uploaded.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Your private key never leaves this device. Export a password-protected copy to restore it on another device.
